name: Ecuyer RPG
description:
Ecuyer is a d6 roll under TTRPG system similar to GURPS and taking inspiration from Whitehack and other games in the OSR.

The system is designed to be modular, with players and Gamemasters encouraged to create their own content in the form of magic items and Runes. 

Ecuyer is compatible with most low-level OSR adventures with light adjustments to Armour Class and Hit Dice.
